titleStmt.title: An epistle directed to all iustices of peace in England and Wales.
titleStmt.author: Bernard, Richard, 1568-1641.

notesStmt.note: Warning the justices of the dangers of Catholics in England.
A reissue, with cancel title page, of the edition dated 1641 in imprint.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "by mr Barnard of Batcome.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
